name: Drop Shoulder Tee - Cornsilk
label: New Arrivals
details: Alphee's Drop Shoulder Tee that offers a much smoother, silky feel and more structured, mid-weight fit than the regular t-shirts . The t-shirts are made with finest quality Combed Compact Cotton , features astonishing ~175 GSM on just 26's cotton which gives a smooth and compact construction. The compact finish guarantees that the t-shirt length and width will not change over wash or months of usage.
composition: 100% cotton, Regular fit, Crew Neck Mid-weight

name: Premium PK Polo - Black
label: New Arrivals
details: Stylish and durable, this polo shirt is crafted with a blend of 97% cotton and 3% spandex for enhanced comfort and breathability. Featuring a medium-weight fabric with a GSM of 220+, it offers a perfect balance of softness, stretch, and durability, making it ideal for both casual and semi-formal occasions. Regular fit, Shirt collar.
